# token

**Instance Property**

An opaque representation of a category of activities.

## Declaration

```swift
let token: ActivityCategoryToken?
```

## Accessing Category Identifiers

- **localizedDisplayName**: A localized display name for the category.

items.description: A localized display name for the category.
items.name: localizedDisplayName
